data.title: Ayushmann Khurrana’s ‘An Action Hero’ to release on OTT, here’s when and where to watch
data.meta_description: Actor Ayushmann Khurrana's upcoming film "An Action Hero" will be streaming exclusively on Netflix from January 27. The film, which is directed by Raj Mehta, will reportedly feature Khurrana in an action-packed role, marking a departure from his usual comedy performances.
data.text:
Synopsis

Actor Ayushmann Khurrana's upcoming film "An Action Hero" will be streaming exclusively on Netflix from January 27. The film, which is directed by Raj Mehta, will reportedly feature Khurrana in an action-packed role, marking a departure from his usual comedy performances.

Ayushmann Khurrana, known for his versatile acting skills, will be seen in a new avatar in his upcoming film "An Action Hero", which is set to stream exclusively on Netflix.

#Budget' 2024 with ET

What's in Sitharaman's Budget for you?

Budget 2024 Income Tax Live Updates

Stock market mood check ahead of Budget

This will be the first time that the Bollywood actor will be seen in an action-packed role, marking a departure from his usual comedic performances. The film is directed by Raj Mehta and produced by Karan Johar's Dharma Productions.

The streaming giant, Netflix, has not yet announced a release date for the film, but fans are eagerly waiting to see Khurrana in a different light. His previous films such as "Badhaai Ho", "Article 15", and "Andhadhun" have received critical acclaim.

Khurrana has always been known for his choice of roles that are offbeat and socially relevant. He has always pushed the boundaries of conventional cinema and has been instrumental in changing the narrative of Hindi cinema.

‘An Action Hero’ is expected to have high-octane action sequences and a visual treat for the audience. The collaboration between Khurrana and Netflix is also expected to reach a global audience, making it one of the most-awaited films of the year.

The streaming giant has been consistently releasing critically acclaimed films and shows, and the addition of "An Action Hero" to its lineup is sure to attract a large audience. With Khurrana's star power and the production house's reputation, the film is sure to be a hit.

FAQs:

Q1. What are some of Ayushmann Khurrana's popular films?

Some of Ayushmann Khurrana's popular films include “Vicky Donor”, "Badhaai Ho", "Article 15", "Andhadhun" and "Dream Girl".

Q2. What genre of films does Ayushmann Khurrana mostly act in?

Ayushmann Khurrana mostly acts in films that are offbeat and socially relevant, with a focus on drama and comedy.
